detail_desc: Knee-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a round neck, flounces at the top and butterfly sleeves. Seam with narrow, concealed elastication and a detachable tie belt under the bust. Unlined.
V-neck top in softly draping viscose jersey. Smocked, frill-trimmed yoke at the shoulders, flutter sleeves and a narrow, elasticated seam under the bust.
V-neck top in softly draping viscose jersey. Smocked, frill-trimmed yoke at the shoulders, flutter sleeves and a narrow, elasticated seam under the bust.

Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a sequined motif on the front, puffy flounces in a double layer of tulle over the shoulders, short slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Waist bag in woven fabric with a print motif and appliqué on the front. Two-way zip at the front and a detachable tab with a carabiner hook. One outer compartment with a zip at the back, two inner compartments, one in mesh, and an adjustable strap with a plastic fastener at the waist. Lined. Depth 4.5 cm. Height 15 cm. Width 31 cm.
Smartphone bag in soft imitation suede with a narrow metal chain shoulder strap and flap with a concealed magnetic fastener and decorative metal ring. Lined. Width 10 cm. Height 15 cm.
Smartphone bag in soft imitation suede with a narrow metal chain shoulder strap and flap with a concealed magnetic fastener and decorative metal ring. Lined. Width 10 cm. Height 15 cm.
Smartphone bag in soft imitation suede with a narrow metal chain shoulder strap and flap with a concealed magnetic fastener and decorative metal ring. Lined. Width 10 cm. Height 15 cm.
Smartphone bag in soft imitation suede with a narrow metal chain shoulder strap and flap with a concealed magnetic fastener and decorative metal ring. Lined. Width 10 cm. Height 15 cm.

Jacket in a recycled polyester weave with notch lapels, concealed press-stud fasteners, gently dropped, padded shoulders and long sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Wide smocking to define the waist, and flap welt front pockets. Lined.
Boxy, oversized shirt in an organic cotton weave with a text print pattern. Turn-down collar, French front, short sleeves, and a gently rounded hem.
Double-layered hat in soft cotton jersey.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist, decorative trims at the top and medium coverage at the back.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a round neck and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Short coat in soft faux shearling with a rounded collar, concealed press-studs down the front and patch front pockets. Recycled polyester lining.
Short coat in soft faux shearling with a rounded collar, concealed press-studs down the front and patch front pockets. Recycled polyester lining.
Short dress in organic cotton piqué with a collar, button placket and short sleeves. Gathered seam and narrow ties under the bust. Unlined.

Short, wide dress in an airy cotton weave with a V-shaped opening at the top and narrow ties at the neckline. Long raglan puff sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a seam at the waist and on the skirt. Unlined.
Calf-length trousers in ribbed jersey made from a soft cotton blend with a wide foldover panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy. Wide, straight legs with overlocked hems.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with a gathered seam under the bust. Unlined.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with a gathered seam under the bust. Unlined.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a round neck and long puff sleeves.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a round neck and long puff sleeves.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a round neck and long puff sleeves.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a round neck and long puff sleeves.

Long-sleeved top in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with a printed and embroidered motif on the front, a fabric appliqué on one sleeve and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Long-sleeved top in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with a printed and embroidered motif on the front, a fabric appliqué on one sleeve and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Thin metal Alice band decorated with glass rhinestones.
Biker jacket in imitation suede with notch lapels, an off-centre zip down the front and zipped side pockets. The jacket is lined in soft faux fur and the pockets in recycled polyester.
Jumpers in soft, fine-knit cotton with a decorative bow at the top, buttons on one shoulder, long sleeves and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumpers in soft, fine-knit cotton with a decorative bow at the top, buttons on one shoulder, long sleeves and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hipster briefs in microfibre made from recycled polyamide. Lace trim at the top, a low waist and cutaway coverage at the back. Gusset lining in organic cotton jersey.

Short, V-neck dress in cotton jersey with broderie anglaise. Covered buttons down the front, short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, a seam at the waist and gently flared, lined skirt.
Cardigans in soft, fine-knit cotton with buttons down the front and a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Shortie briefs in stretch fabric, reinforced at the front and lower back to support a growing tummy. High waist, lined gusset, low-cut legs and full coverage at the back. Designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
Sleeveless top in soft jersey made from a modal and organic cotton blend with a small flounce at the front that continues over the shoulders.
Sleeveless top in soft jersey made from a modal and organic cotton blend with a small flounce at the front that continues over the shoulders.
Knee-length shorts in a herringbone weave with a high waist, zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening, pockets in the side seams, fake back pockets and legs with creases.

Jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a concealed silicone trim at the top. Seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt, side pockets and fake welt back pockets. Concealed zip in one side and tapered legs with creases. Lined at the top.

Small bag decoration in transparent plastic with a holographic finish in the shape of a handbag with space for keys or other small items. The bag has a handle and flap with a press-stud fastening. Metal chain with a keyring and carabiner hook at the top. Size of bag: Height 6 cm. Width 7.5 cm. Depth 2.5 cm. Length of key chain 10 cm.
Boots in imitation leather with lacing at the front, rounded toes and chunky soles at the front. Recycled polyester linings and insoles. Heel 10.5 cm.
Cardigan knitted in a soft wool blend with long, wide puff sleeves and covered buttons down the front. Ribbed trim around the neckline, down the button band and at the cuffs and hem.
Cardigan knitted in a soft wool blend with long, wide puff sleeves and covered buttons down the front. Ribbed trim around the neckline, down the button band and at the cuffs and hem.
Calf-length kaftan dress in cool viscose jersey. Relaxed fit with a V-neck and short sleeves. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Poncho in a soft weave with a fringed hem, and open sides and front. Length of front 85 cm. Length of back 65 cm.
Handbag in glittery, transparent plastic with an all-over print, a zip and two handles at the top and trims around the short sides. Width 10 cm. Height 13 cm. Length 19 cm.
Set with a hat and mittens knitted in a soft cotton blend. Hat with ears on top, embroidered details at the front and a ribbed hem. Mittens with ribbed cuffs. Size 2-6M without thumbs.
Set with a hat and mittens knitted in a soft cotton blend. Hat with ears on top, embroidered details at the front and a ribbed hem. Mittens with ribbed cuffs. Size 2-6M without thumbs.
Poncho in a soft, fine-knit wool and cashmere blend with a draped collar and ribbed trim at one side.
Poncho in a soft, fine-knit wool and cashmere blend with a draped collar and ribbed trim at one side.
Scarf in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbed trims on the short sides. Length 180 cm. Width 40 cm.
Scarf in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbed trims on the short sides. Length 180 cm. Width 40 cm.
Scarf in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbed trims on the short sides. Length 180 cm. Width 40 cm.
Cropped top in smocked jersey made partly from recycled polyester with a square neckline. Long mesh sleeves with flock-print spots and smocked seams in the middle and at the cuffs.

Bra top in microfibre with a lined front, wide shoulder straps and padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Folded, glued edges for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin and minimal visibility under clothes. No fasteners.

Bra top in microfibre with a lined front, wide shoulder straps and padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Folded, glued edges for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin and minimal visibility under clothes. No fasteners.
Polo-neck collar in a soft rib knit with a longer front and back and ties at the sides.

Short dress in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with a round neckline, press-stud placket and a yoke with gathers at the shoulders. Long puff sleeves, narrow cuffs with press-studs, a detachable tie belt under the bust and discreet pockets in the side seams. Rounded hem.
Round-necked top in ribbed jersey made from a soft cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Overlocked edges around the sleeves and hem.
Poncho in a soft, fine knit with a rib-knit polo neck.
Poncho in a soft, fine knit with a rib-knit polo neck.
Non-wired, push-up biker body in jersey with a gentle sculpting effect on the waist. Adjustable shoulder straps and padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage.

Trunks in stretch jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and short legs. The trunks are made from COOLMAX® functional fabric, a unique, soft, comfortable and fast-drying polyester fibre that efficiently wicks moisture while regulating temperature.

Trunks in stretch jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and short legs. The trunks are made from COOLMAX® functional fabric, a unique, soft, comfortable and fast-drying polyester fibre that efficiently wicks moisture while regulating temperature.
Fitted blouse in a linen and viscose weave with a sweetheart neckline and decorative gathers at the bust. Short, voluminous puff sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the shoulders and hems.
Boots in imitation patent leather with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front, a loop at the back and a zip in one side. Fabric linings and insoles, and patterned soles.
Boots in imitation patent leather with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front, a loop at the back and a zip in one side. Fabric linings and insoles, and patterned soles.
Boots in imitation patent leather with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front, a loop at the back and a zip in one side. Fabric linings and insoles, and patterned soles.
Boots in imitation patent leather with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front, a loop at the back and a zip in one side. Fabric linings and insoles, and patterned soles.
Warm-lined ankle boots in imitation leather with chunky soles. Lacing at the front, a zip in one side and loop at the back. Soft velour linings and insoles. Height of soles 3.5 cm.
Warm-lined ankle boots in imitation leather with chunky soles. Lacing at the front, a zip in one side and loop at the back. Soft velour linings and insoles. Height of soles 3.5 cm.
Lined boots in imitation leather with a lightly padded, quilted shaft and zip in one side. Faux shearling linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 1.8 cm.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 1.8 cm.
Boots with warm faux fur linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Boots with warm faux fur linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Boots with warm faux fur linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Boots with warm faux fur linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and loops at the top of the shaft. Linings and insoles in soft faux shearling, and chunky soles.
